title: Confluence Publishing Configuration
description: Configuration for publishing documentation to Confluence. Copy to confluence-config.json and update values.

_comments.confluenceSpaceKey: FOR GITHUB ACTIONS: Injected from CONFLUENCE_SPACE_KEY variable at runtime. FOR MANUAL USE: Set to your actual space key.
_comments.atlassianUsername: FOR GITHUB ACTIONS: Injected from CONFLUENCE_USER_EMAIL secret at runtime. FOR MANUAL USE: Set to your service account email
_comments.parentPageId: OPTIONAL: Leave empty to publish to space root, or add a page ID from the URL
_comments.spaceMapping: Maps folder names to Confluence space keys

spaceMapping._comment: Maps folder names to Confluence space keys

publishPaths._comment: Add paths to documents you want to publish
